p: GC/MS investigation was conducted on D. bulbifera methanol extract. The peaks in the chromatogram were integrated and matched with the database spectra of recognised compounds stored in the GC-MS libraries of Pfleger–Maurer–Weber-drug, National Institute of Standard and Technology (NIST), WILEY229.LIB, Flavour, Fragrance, Natural and Synthetic Compounds (FFNSC1.3.lib), and Pesticides Library for toxicology (PMW_tox2).
